Header: Troops of 22 Division Support Blood Donation in Trincomalee
Content: More than 76 Officers and Other Ranks of the 22 Division headquarters in Trincomalee, voluntarily donated their blood for the use of patients in all hospitals in the district during a blood donation programme, organized at the Lanka IOC Terminal China Bay on Wednesday (29) with the support of the troops of the 22 Division. The troops actively supported the programme in response to a request, made by Mr Chiranjeevi, the Vice President of Lanka IOC PLC from Major General Aruna Jayasekara, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 22 Division.
